summary: Diff implements updated dummy Exercise Info content (including BENEFITS/METHOD for Equal Breathing), updates Home info navigation to pass exerciseId, and updates Exercise Info header to a Close (X) button with back-or-home behavior. However, the diff excerpt does not provide clear evidence that the “BEGIN EXERCISE” bottom CTA is rendered, nor that the accordion headers include a visible right-side chevron indicator reflecting open/closed state.

missing_requirements.requirement: Collapsible sections include a right-side chevron indicator reflecting open/closed state.
missing_requirements.reason: ExerciseInfo.tsx shows AccordionTrigger with uppercase styling, but the diff excerpt does not show any explicit chevron icon/indicator or state-reflecting UI. If the chevron comes from the underlying shadcn AccordionTrigger implementation, it is not evidenced in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a bottom primary CTA button labeled “BEGIN EXERCISE” on /exercise-info that navigates to /player with the correct pattern and saved per-exercise duration, and hide/replace it for non-playable exerciseIds.
missing_requirements.reason: ExerciseInfo.tsx includes navigation logic (handleBeginExercise) and computes isPlayableExercise, but the provided truncated diff excerpt does not show any rendered Button/CTA labeled “BEGIN EXERCISE” near the bottom or any conditional hide/replace behavior in the JSX.
